reference: In a light raster scanning system imaging a medium (40) located on a movable stage and using bidirectional scanning, i.e. scanning during stage movement in two opposing directions, the problem of chevron artifacts (angle errors), due to the different stage movement directions, is overcome by a system of reflective optics including two optical elements (14, 16) dynamically movable relative to one another. One (14) of the optical reflective elements (14, 16) is tilted or rotated relative to the other to compensate for the angle error causing the chevron artifacts. The amount of this tilt is dynamically altered depending on the direction of stage travel and also may be dynamically adjusted to maintain linearity of the scan pattern in spite of any other irregularities in stage velocity. Also an autofocus feature is provided, whereby the two reflective elements (14, 16) are moved relative to one another to dynamically alter the focus of the light beam (12) onto the medium (40) and hence overcome any defocus problems due to irregularities in the medium surface.

origin.en: In a light raster scanning system imaging a medium (40) located on a movable stage and using bidirectional scanning, i.e. scanning during stage movement in two opposing directions, the problem of chevron artifacts (angle errors), due to the different stage movement directions, is overcome by a system of reflective optics including two optical elements (14, 16) dynamically movable relative to one another. One (14) of the optical reflective elements (14, 16) is tilted or rotated relative to the other to compensate for the angle error causing the chevron artifacts. The amount of this tilt is dynamically altered depending on the direction of stage travel and also may be dynamically adjusted to maintain linearity of the scan pattern in spite of any other irregularities in stage velocity. Also an autofocus feature is provided, whereby the two reflective elements (14, 16) are moved relative to one another to dynamically alter the focus of the light beam (12) onto the medium (40) and hence overcome any defocus problems due to irregularities in the medium surface.

reference: A process for the separation and drying of crude carboxylic acid crystals from a slurry in a solvent is described. The process comprises the steps of: supplying the slurry comprising crystals of carboxylic acid to a filter operating at pressure and at a temperature above the atmospheric boiling point of the solvent; removing a cake of separated crystals from said filter; and passing said cake to a thermal dryer. Also described is a system for the separation and drying of crude carboxylic acid from a slurry in a solvent comprising: a pressure filter device comprising a slurry inlet and an outlet for a cake of carboxylic acid crystals; and a thermal dryer and means for transporting the cake of carboxylic acid crystals from the pressure filter device to the dryer; wherein said pressure filter device is configured to operate at a pressure and temperature above the atmospheric boiling point of the solvent.

reference: Disclosed are methods and apparatuses for preventing memory violations. In an aspect, a fetch unit accesses, from a branch predictor of a processor, a disambiguation indicator associated with a block of instructions of a program to be executed by the processor, and fetches, from an instruction cache, the block of instructions. The processor executes load instructions and/or store instructions in the block of instructions based on the disambiguation indicator indicating whether or not the load instructions and/or the store instructions in the block of instructions can bypass other instructions of the program or be bypassed by other instructions of the program.

reference: A lid spray head for a high pressure gas container is provided. The lid spray head includes an annular surrounding wall having an enclosed space and an opening portion; an L-shaped nozzle disposed in the enclosed space, integrally connected to an inner wall of the annular surrounding wall with a U-shaped elastic arm, and having a connection port and a nozzle port corresponding to each other, wherein the connection port is sleeved on a valve protruding member of the high pressure gas container and the nozzle port protrudes out of the opening portion; and a handle disposed out of the opening portion and integrally disposed at a bottom of the nozzle port of the L-shaped nozzle. reference: To provide a shopping support system capable of solving shopping difficulty for a person having difficulty in shopping. A shopping support system allows a user of the present invention to purchase a commodity from a store at a place distant from the store. The shopping support system comprises: an image receiver for accepting an input operation by the user; an imaging apparatus for photographing the user; a voice communication apparatus for allowing the user and the store to perform voice communication; and a server installed in the store and connected with at least one of the image receiver, the imaging apparatus, and the voice communication apparatus via an electric line. The image receiver transmits desired commodity information on a commodity desired by the user to the server on the basis of input operation by the user. The server makes a purchase contract with the user on the basis of the desired commodity information.

origin.en: [Problem] To provide a method for producing a non-rectangular steel sheet to be heated to the predetermined temperature, a method and apparatus for producing a press-molded article using the non-rectangular steel sheet for press molding that is produced by means of that method for producing the same. [Solution] The method for producing a steel sheet for press molding according to one embodiment of the invention includes an electrical heating process (STEP-101) for electrically heating a blank (10) of rectangular steel sheet, viewed from the thickness direction of the blank, and a bending process (STEP-102) for deforming the blank (10) from a rectangle to a non-rectangle by applying stress in a horizontal direction to the surfaces (front (10a) and back (10b)) of the blank (10) after the start of electrical heating.
origin.ko: [과제] 소정의 온도로 가열되는 비사각형 강판의 제조 방법, 그 제조 방법. [해결책] 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 프레스 성형용 강판의 제조방법은, 직사각형 강판의 블랭크(10)를 두께 방향에서 볼 때, 전기적으로 가열하는 전기 가열 공정(STEP-101)을 포함한다. 블랭크 및 블랭크의 표면(전면(10a) 및 후면(10b))에 수평방향으로 응력을 가하여 블랭크(10)를 직사각형에서 비사각형으로 변형시키는 굽힘공정(STEP-102) (10) 전기 가열 시작 후.

reference: To provide an elastic engaging or disengaging clamp enabling one person to finish an engaging or disengaging operation for a pair of flanges within a short period of time and further enabling a joint piping assembly and decomposition work cost to be reduced. The structure of the invention is configured such that: a plurality of divided clamp segments of an engaging or disengaging clamp are supported by a circular resilient supporting member made by a resilient band-like leaf spring material of steel, for example, a material in which the circumference of a leaf spring material of steel or the like is covered by plastics or rubber material of silicone rubber system, or a resin material such as a resin resilient member having a spring force; there is provided restricting means for temporarily restricting a shape of the circular resilient supporting member while its resiliency being left; there is provided a releasing mechanism for releasing the restricting means after the circular resilient supporting member is arranged around a fastening flange; and the clamp segments automatically cover the surrounding of the flange with a resilient force of the circular resilient supporting member after the releasing.
generation: It is intended to provide an elastic coupling or release clamp that allows a person to complete the engagement or release of a pair of flanges in a short period of time, and further reduces the cost of joint piping assembly and disassembly. The structure of the present invention is that a plurality of divided clamp segments of a coupling or release clamp are supported by a circular elastic support member made of, for example, an elastic band-type leaf spring material of steel, and the circumference of a leaf spring material such as steel is covered by a plastic or rubber material of a silicone rubber system or a resin material such as a resin elastic support member with spring force; a limiting means is provided to temporarily limit the shape of the circular elastic support member while the restoring force of the circular elastic support member remains; a releasing mechanism is provided to release the limiting means after the circular elastic support member is placed around the fastening flange; the clamp segments are configured to automatically cover the flange with the restoring force of the circular elastic support member after release.
generation1: 한 사람이 짧은 시간 내에 한 쌍의 플랜지에 대한 결합 또는 해제 작업을 완료할 수 있도록 하고, 나아가 조인트 배관 조립 및 분해 작업 비용을 절감할 수 있도록 하는 탄성 결합 또는 해제 클램프를 제공하기 위한 것. 본 발명의 구조는: 결합 또는 해제 클램프의 복수의 분할된 클램프 세그먼트들이, 예를 들어, 강철의 탄성 밴드형 판 스프링 재료에 의해 제조된 원형 탄성 지지 부재에 의해 지지되고, 예를 들어, 강철 등의 판 스프링 재료의 둘레가 실리콘 고무 시스템의 플라스틱 또는 고무 재료에 의해 피복된 재료 또는 스프링력을 갖는 수지 탄성 지지 부재와 같은 수지 재료에 의해 피복되고; 원형 탄성 지지 부재의 복원력이 남아 있는 상태에서 일시적으로 원형 탄성 지지 부재의 형상을 제한하기 위한 제한 수단이 제공되고; 상기 원형 탄성 지지 부재가 체결 플랜지 주위에 배치된 후에 상기 제한 수단을 해제하기 위한 해제 메커니즘이 제공되고; 상기 클램프 세그먼트들은 해제 후에 상기 원형 탄성 지지 부재의 복원력으로 상기 플랜지 주위를 자동으로 피복하도록 구성된다.

origin.en: To provide an elastic engaging or disengaging clamp enabling one person to finish an engaging or disengaging operation for a pair of flanges within a short period of time and further enabling a joint piping assembly and decomposition work cost to be reduced. The structure of the invention is configured such that: a plurality of divided clamp segments of an engaging or disengaging clamp are supported by a circular resilient supporting member made by a resilient band-like leaf spring material of steel, for example, a material in which the circumference of a leaf spring material of steel or the like is covered by plastics or rubber material of silicone rubber system, or a resin material such as a resin resilient member having a spring force; there is provided restricting means for temporarily restricting a shape of the circular resilient supporting member while its resiliency being left; there is provided a releasing mechanism for releasing the restricting means after the circular resilient supporting member is arranged around a fastening flange; and the clamp segments automatically cover the surrounding of the flange with a resilient force of the circular resilient supporting member after the releasing.
origin.ko: 한 쌍의 플랜지 체결 및 해제 작업을 혼자서 단시간에 종료할 수 있고 조인트 배관의 조립, 해체 작업 비용을 절감할 수 있는 탄성 착탈 클램프를 제공하는 데 있다. 착탈 클램프의 복수개로 분할된 클램프 세그먼트를 탄성을 가지는 예를 들면 강 등의 띠형 판스프링재나 강 등의 판스프링재의 주위를 플라스틱이나 실리콘 고무계의 고무재로 피복한 소재나 스프링력을 가진 수지 탄성체 등의 수지재로 제작된 원형 탄성 지지체로 지지하고 상기 원형 탄성 지지체의 형상을 탄성을 남겨두어 일시적으로 구속하는 구속 수단을 가지며, 체결하는 플랜지 주위에 원형 탄성 지지체를 배치한 후, 상기 구속 수단을 해제하는 해제 기구를 구비하고 해제 후에 상기 원형 탄성 지지체의 탄성력으로 상기 플랜지 주위에 상기 클램프 세그먼트가 자동으로 덮이도록 기능하는 구조에 구성한 것이다.

reference: The invention discloses a waste collecting rack for a steel strip cutting machine. the waste collecting rack for the steel strip cutting machine comprises supporting discs perpendicular to a horizontal plane, a rotating shaft, supporting rods and extensible parts, the center of one supporting disc is provided with an adapting sleeve, one end of the rotating shaft is fixed inside the adapting sleeve, the other end of the rotating shaft is fixedly provided with a lantern ring, the extensible parts are distributed on the circumferential surface of the lantern ring, the top of every extensible part is hinged and fixed to one end of the corresponding supporting rod, and the other end of every supporting rod is fixed onto the corresponding supporting disc. the waste collecting rack for the steel strip cutting machine is reasonable in design, can better wind and collect waste, facilitates cleaning of workers and improves work efficiency.

The waste collection rack for a steel strip cutter includes support disks, rotary shafts, support rods, and extendable parts perpendicular to a horizontal plane, an adaptive sleeve is provided in the center of one support disk, an adaptive sleeve is provided at one end of the rotary shaft, one end of the rotary shaft is fixed inside the adaptive sleeve, the lantern ring is fixed to the other end of the rotary shaft, the extendable parts are fixed to the circumferential surface of the lantern ring, and the top of all extendable parts is hinged and fixed to one end of the corresponding support rod, and the other end of all support rods is fixed to the corresponding support disk.
generation1: 본 발명은 스틸 스트립 절단기용 폐기물 수집 랙을 개시한다. 스틸 스트립 절단기용 폐기물 수집 랙은 수평면에 수직인 지지 디스크들, 회전축, 지지 로드들 및 연장 가능한 부품들을 포함하고, 하나의 지지 디스크의 중앙에는 적응 슬리브가 구비되고, 회전축의 일단에는 적응 슬리브가 구비되며, 회전축의 일단에는 적응 슬리브의 내부에 고정되고, 회전축의 타단에는 랜턴 링이 고정되고, 연장 가능한 부품들은 랜턴 링의 둘레면에 고정되고, 모든 연장 가능한 부품들의 상단에는 대응하는 지지 로드의 일단에 힌지 결합되어 고정되고, 모든 지지 로드의 타단에는 대응하는 지지 디스크에 고정되는 것을 특징으로 하는 스틸 스트립 절단기용 폐기물 수집 랙.

origin.en: The invention discloses a waste collecting rack for a steel strip cutting machine. the waste collecting rack for the steel strip cutting machine comprises supporting discs perpendicular to a horizontal plane, a rotating shaft, supporting rods and extensible parts, the center of one supporting disc is provided with an adapting sleeve, one end of the rotating shaft is fixed inside the adapting sleeve, the other end of the rotating shaft is fixedly provided with a lantern ring, the extensible parts are distributed on the circumferential surface of the lantern ring, the top of every extensible part is hinged and fixed to one end of the corresponding supporting rod, and the other end of every supporting rod is fixed onto the corresponding supporting disc. the waste collecting rack for the steel strip cutting machine is reasonable in design, can better wind and collect waste, facilitates cleaning of workers and improves work efficiency.
origin.ko: 이 발명품은 강철 스트립 절단기를 위한 폐기물 수거대를 공개합니다. 강철 스트립 절단기의 폐기물 수집 랙은 수평면에 수직인 지지 디스크, 회전축, 지지봉 및 확장 가능한 부품으로 구성됩니다. 하나의 지지 디스크의 중심에는 적응 슬리브가 제공되고, 회전축의 한쪽 끝은 적응 슬리브 안에 고정됩니다. 샤프트는 랜턴 링으로 고정되어 있으며, 확장 가능한 부품은 랜턴 링의 원주 표면에 분산되어 있으며, 모든 확장 가능한 부품의 상단은 힌지로 연결되고 해당 지지 막대의 한쪽 끝에 고정되며, 모든 지지 막대의 다른 쪽 끝은 해당 지지 디스크에 고정됩니다. 강철 스트립 절단기의 폐기물 수집 랙은 설계가 합리적이고, 바람과 폐기물을 더 잘 모을 수 있으며, 작업자의 청소를 용이하게 하고, 작업 효율을 개선합니다.
